title: Ultrafun 5 Pairs Soccer Socks with Grip Pads Non Slip Football Basketball Sports Socks for Men Women
description: High Quality Material: Ultrafun mens soccer socks are made of 97% polyester and 3% spandex, good in quality, soft and skin-friendly, breathable and moisture-wicking, durable and wear-resistant, odorless, no pilling
Non Slip Silicone Pads: Due to large-area non slip silicone grip pads on the bottom, can provide your feet with great stability, won't let you slide down when walking on tiles or floors

High Performance Socks: Anti slip socks are featured with elastic rib cuffs, comfy sock tube with thread structure, reinforced toes, thickened heels, to keep your feet away from blister, shock, friction and fatigue

Stretchy & Comfy to Wear: The soccer socks are 6.7 inches in socks tube, 8.7 inches in socks sole, high in elasticity, one size fits for men shoe size EU 39-45/US 6-11.5, suitable for most adults men women and teen boys

Athletic Sports Use: Especially designed for indoor and outdoor activities, ideal for soccer, football, basketball, volleyball, lacrosse, skateboarding, running, yoga, pilate, cycling, workout, gym and daily life
